mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.boss_name AS "bossName", a.supplier_no AS "supplierNo", a.logo_picture_url AS "logoPictureUrl", a.manager_id AS "manager_id", a.description AS "description", a.store_address AS "storeAddress", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.version AS "version"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supplier( id, name, boss_name, supplier_no, logo_picture_url, manager_id, store_address, description, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, version ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{bossName}, #{supplierNo}, #{logoPictureUrl}, #{managerId}, #{storeAddress}, #{description}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{version} )
mapper.update: UPDATE supplier SET name = #{name}, boss_name = #{bossName}, supplier_no = #{supplierNo}, logo_picture_url = #{logoPictureUrl}, manager_id = #{managerId}, store_address = #{storeAddress}, description = #{description}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, version = #{version} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT , sys_user.name AS "managerName" FROM supplier a LEFT JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.id = a.manager_id WHERE a.id = #{id} limit 1

SELECT
FROM sys_user_supplier RIGHT JOIN supplier a on sys_user_supplier.supplier_id = a.id WHERE sys_user_supplier.sys_user_id = #{userId}
